name: The Door (itch) (Luke Van Zandt)
description:
The Door is a short supernatural horror game made in a month for "The Forgotten Tapes: Analog Nightmares", and the debut game for it's developer. 

FEATURES

- Explore a mysterious facility while competing entitles vie for your compliance.

- Discover how to operate an enigmatic machine to uncover where the hole leads. 

- Dread and paranoia focused horror elements.

- A key decision will have ramifications throughout the game. 

- A short experience, in which both endings can be attained within ~40 minutes. 

GAMEPLAY

Use clues within your surroundings to operate a strange machine and uncover the purpose of the facility. Be tempted by competing power and make a key decision. 

STORY

"...behold a white horse..."
